hero.description: From daily use cars to high-end luxury cars, a full variety of your favorite vehicles are available all in one place at Kyaw Kyar.

meta.title: Kyaw Kyar Car Showroom | Buy & Sell Quality Vehicles
meta.description: Myanmar’s trusted destination for inspected cars, transparent pricing, flexible payments, and premium after-sales service.

featured.title: Top Tier
featured.subtitle: Handpicked Just for You
featured.description: Explore our exclusive selection of featured vehicles, meticulously chosen to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. Each car in this collection has been thoroughly inspected and is ready to provide you with an exceptional driving experience.

new_arrivals.title: Fresh
new_arrivals.subtitle: Latest Additions to Our Showroom
new_arrivals.description: Discover the newest additions to our showroom, featuring the latest models and innovations in the automotive world. These vehicles have just arrived and are ready for you to explore, test drive, and make your own.

whybuy.subtitle: THE KYAW KYAR Standard
whybuy.description: Our standard means every car is multi-point inspected, every payment plan stays flexible, every history is verified, and every purchase comes with a buy-back promise.

inspection.title: Rigorous Quality Inspection
inspection.description: Every vehicle undergoes a rigorous inspection of the engine, chassis, and all mechanical components to ensure the highest quality before arriving at our showroom.

financing.title: Flexible Financing
financing.description: we offer flexible payment plans, including direct showroom installments and bank financing options through our partners AYA, CB, and KBZ.

clean-history.title: Clean History Only
clean-history.description: We guarantee a 100% clean history for every vehicle. Our selection excludes 'Owner Book' copies, illegal modifications, and any legal complications, ensuring you drive away with total confidence.

swift-processing.title: Swift Processing
swift-processing.description: Documentation and ownership transfers are handled by our experts. Drive home your new car in 24 hours.

buy-at-market-price.title: Resell at Market Price
buy-at-market-price.description: For vehicles purchased from our showroom, we offer a guaranteed buy-back option at current market value whenever you are ready to sell.

support.title: After-Sales Support
support.description: Our dedicated After-Sales Service team is always here to assist you with routine maintenance, expert repairs, and any technical support you need long after your purchase.

browse_by_body_type.title: Browse by
browse_by_body_type.subtitle: Find Your Perfect Match
browse_by_body_type.description: Explore our diverse range of vehicles categorized by body type. Whether you're looking for a sleek sedan, a spacious SUV, or a versatile hatchback, we have the perfect car to suit your lifestyle and preferences.

browse_by_brand.title: Browse by
browse_by_brand.subtitle: Find Your Perfect Match
browse_by_brand.description: Explore our diverse range of vehicles categorized by body type. Whether you're looking for a sleek sedan, a spacious SUV, or a versatile hatchback, we have the perfect car to suit your lifestyle and preferences.

showrooms.label: Locations
showrooms.title: Our
showrooms.subtitle: Visit us at our convenient locations to find your dream car.

about_teaser.title: Your Trusted Multi-Brand Car Showroom in Myanmar
about_teaser.description: Kyaw Kyar has established itself as Myanmar's leading destination for quality vehicles. We hand-select every car, perform comprehensive multi-point inspections, and provide flexible financing options to make your dream car ownership a reality. From daily-use vehicles to premium luxury cars, we offer transparent pricing, verified clean history, and dedicated after-sales support—all backed by our commitment to excellence and customer satisfaction.
